languages.text: Конструкция с огромной линзой, без сомнения, напитана силой {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}, враждебной всему благородному и праведному, что есть на свете. Ее излучение может иметь чудовищные последствия для тех, кто окажется под этим оскверненным лучом.

traits.locale_text: Конструкция с огромной линзой, без сомнения, напитана силой {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}, враждебной всему благородному и праведному, что есть на свете. Ее излучение может иметь чудовищные последствия для тех, кто окажется под этим оскверненным лучом.

languages.text: The enormous mounted lens was doubtlessly imbued with the power of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, inimical to all that is noble and virtuous in the universe. Anyone caught in the corrupted light it emits will face horrifying consequences.
languages.original_text: Конструкция с огромной линзой, без сомнения, напитана силой {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}, враждебной всему благородному и праведному, что есть на свете. Ее излучение может иметь чудовищные последствия для тех, кто окажется под этим оскверненным лучом.

traits.locale_text: The enormous mounted lens was doubtlessly imbued with the power of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, inimical to all that is noble and virtuous in the world. Its emitted ray might have monstrous consequences for whoever was in the path of that corrupted light.

The enormous mounted lens was doubtlessly imbued with the power of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, inimical to all that is noble and virtuous in the world. Its emitted ray might have monstrous consequences for whoever was in the path of that corrupted light.

The enormous mounted lens was doubtlessly imbued with the power of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, inimical to all that is noble and virtuous in the world. Anyone caught in the corrupted light it emits will face horrifying consequences.

The enormous mounted lens was doubtlessly imbued with the power of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, inimical to all that is noble and virtuous in the world. Anyone caught in the corrupted light it emits will face horrifying consequences.

The enormous mounted lens was doubtlessly imbued with the power of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, inimical to all that is noble and virtuous in the universe. Anyone caught in the corrupted light it emits will face horrifying consequences.

The enormous mounted lens was doubtlessly imbued with the power of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, inimical to all that is noble and virtuous in the universe. Anyone caught in the corrupted light it emits will face horrifying consequences.

languages.text: Die riesige Linse war ohne jeden Zweifel mit der Macht des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeindes{/g} versehen, die allem Noblen und Tugendhaften im Universum gegenüber schädlich ist. Es war offenkundig: Jeder, der vom verdorbenen Licht der Linse getroffen wurde, musste mit grauenhaften Folgen rechnen.
languages.original_text: The enormous mounted lens was doubtlessly imbued with the power of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, inimical to all that is noble and virtuous in the universe. Anyone caught in the corrupted light it emits will face horrifying consequences.

traits.locale_text: Die riesige Linse war ohne jeden Zweifel mit der Macht des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeindes{/g} verstehen, die allem Noblen und Tugendhaften in der Welt gegenüber schädlich ist. Es war offenkundig: Jeder, der vom verdorbenen Licht der Linse getroffen wurde, musste mit grauenhaften Folgen rechnen.

languages.text: L'énorme lentille est indéniablement imprégnée du pouvoir du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}, hostile à tout ce qui est noble et vertueux. À l'évidence, toute personne touchée par la lumière corrompue qu'elle émet en subira de terribles conséquences.
languages.original_text: The enormous mounted lens was doubtlessly imbued with the power of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, inimical to all that is noble and virtuous in the universe. Anyone caught in the corrupted light it emits will face horrifying consequences.

traits.locale_text: L'énorme lentille est indéniablement imprégnée du pouvoir du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}, hostile à tout ce qui est noble et vertueux. À l'évidence, toute personne touchée par la lumière corrompue qu'elle émet en subira de terribles conséquences.

languages.text: 毫无疑问，那架巨大的透镜充满了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的力量，敌视着整个宇宙中所有高贵与善良之人。所有被它的污浊之光照到的人，都将遭受可怕的后果。
languages.original_text: The enormous mounted lens was doubtlessly imbued with the power of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, inimical to all that is noble and virtuous in the universe. Anyone caught in the corrupted light it emits will face horrifying consequences.

traits.locale_text: 毫无疑问，那架巨大的透镜充满了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的力量，敌视着世界上所有的高贵与善良之人。所有被它的污浊之光照到的人，都将遭受可怕的后果。

languages.text: 取り付けられた巨大なレンズには、宇宙のあらゆる気高く高潔なものに仇なす{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の力が宿っているに違いない。その腐敗した光に照らされる者は、恐ろしい結末を迎えることであろう。
languages.original_text: The enormous mounted lens was doubtlessly imbued with the power of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, inimical to all that is noble and virtuous in the universe. Anyone caught in the corrupted light it emits will face horrifying consequences.

traits.locale_text: 取り付けられた巨大なレンズには、この世のあらゆる気高く高潔なものに仇なす{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の力が宿っているに違いない。その腐敗した光に照らされる者は、恐ろしい結末を迎えることであろう。

languages.text: La enorme lente estaba sin duda imbuida del poder del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}, hostil a todo lo que es noble y bueno en el universo. Cualquiera que quede atrapado en la luz corrupta que emite sufrirá horribles consecuencias.
languages.original_text: The enormous mounted lens was doubtlessly imbued with the power of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, inimical to all that is noble and virtuous in the universe. Anyone caught in the corrupted light it emits will face horrifying consequences.

traits.locale_text: La enorme lente estaba sin duda imbuida del poder del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}, hostil a todo lo que es noble y bueno en el mundo. Cualquiera que quede atrapado en la luz corrupta que emite sufrirá horribles consecuencias.

languages.text: Kaideli muazzam mercek, kuşkusuz evrendeki asil ve erdemli her şeyin aleyhtarı {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} kudretiyle doluydu. Merceğin yaydığı yozlaşmış ışığa yakalanan kim olursa korkunç sonuçlarla karşı karşıya kalacaktı.
languages.original_text: The enormous mounted lens was doubtlessly imbued with the power of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, inimical to all that is noble and virtuous in the universe. Anyone caught in the corrupted light it emits will face horrifying consequences.

traits.locale_text: Kaideli muazzam mercek, kuşkusuz evrendeki asil ve erdemli her şeyin aleyhtarı {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın kudretiyle doluydu. Merceğin yaydığı yozlaşmış ışığa yakalanan kim olursa korkunç sonuçlarla karşı karşıya kalacaktı.
